text: Louis Segondi (30 November 1879 - 23 June 1949) was a French track and field athlete who competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris, France, his birthplace. Segondi competed in the 1500 metres. He placed in the bottom third of the nine-man, single-round event. ==References== * De Wael, Herman. Herman's Full Olympians: "Athletics 1900". Accessed 18 March 2006. title: Louis Segondi
